title: AFEX Asia Food Expo
description: Executed a comprehensive website revision project tailored for the client's 2024 event, meticulously incorporating their feedback and specific requirements to enhance user experience and functionality.

title: Venum Philippines
description: Transitioned the Venum Philippines website to the Shopify platform. Collaborated extensively with clients to understand their needs and effectively deliver unique solutions.

title: Planets Fact
description: A website that displays specific information about the planet you've chosen. Data was mapped from a JSON file, and hooks were used to handle states.
